title: Unexpected Problem
body:
so me and 4 friends decided to que for a game
we got in game and from their champ select timer finished but we where not put into game still in chat lobby and could talk then we left and reconnected but when we all pressed reconnect it did nothing other than just sit still frozen...

replies.body: just an add to this we finnaly got into loading screen and all players are connected but now we are all stuck in loading screen i have added a few of the players on the other team and they are experiencing the same problem
